titles.title: Welfare Of Our Furry Friends (WOOFF) Act
A bill to direct the Administrator of the Federal Aviation Administration to promulgate regulations to prohibit the storage of live animals in overhead compartments of airplanes.
Welfare Of Our Furry Friends (WOOFF) Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
Welfare Of Our Furry Friends (WOOFF) Act
This bill directs the Federal Aviation Administration to promulgate regulations: (1) prohibiting the storage of a live animal in an overhead compartment of a flight in air transportation, and (2) establishing fines for a violation of such prohibition.
